Researchers have recommended that the designation Schwartz-Jampel syndrome type 2 no longer be used.",GHR,Stve-Wiedemann syndrome
How many people are affected by Stve-Wiedemann syndrome ?,Stve-Wiedemann syndrome is a rare condition that has been found worldwide. Its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,Stve-Wiedemann
